name: Old School Outlook Terminal
description:
Inspired by the old school gmail terminal theme:

https://userstyles.org/styles/120236/old-school-gmail-terminal-theme

Ads are gone.

FOR OUTLOOK BETA ONLY!!!
additional_info:
I have never learned CSS before and have spent only 3 hours on this project. If you have any way to optimize this theme (like making the borders design better instead of just erasing all borders), please LEAVE ALL YOUR CODE in the comment and TELL ME HOW TO EDIT my code as detailed as possible, please please please.

I am learning Github...and I am trying my best, but I am just not a computer type person.

Sorry for any grammar mistake. English is not my mother tongue.

Hope this help.
